submodules.title: Task Creation
submodules.description: Allows users to add new tasks with a title and optional description. Users can set due dates and priorities to help organize their tasks effectively.

submodules.title: Task Completion
submodules.description: Enables users to mark tasks as done using a checkbox. Completed tasks are visually distinguished to enhance user experience and provide a clear overview of progress.

submodules.title: Task Deletion
submodules.description: Provides functionality for users to delete tasks they no longer need. This includes confirmation prompts to prevent accidental deletions.

submodules.title: Task Filtering
submodules.description: Allows users to filter tasks based on their status: all, active, or completed. This feature helps users focus on specific tasks and manage their workload efficiently.

submodules.title: Clean UI Design
submodules.description: Focuses on a minimalistic design that enhances usability. The interface is intuitive, ensuring that users can navigate and manage their tasks without confusion.

submodules.title: Responsive Design
submodules.description: Ensures that the application is fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

submodules.title: Light/Dark Theme Toggle
submodules.description: Offers users the option to switch between light and dark themes, catering to personal preferences and improving accessibility in different lighting conditions.

submodules.title: LocalStorage Integration
submodules.description: Utilizes localStorage to save tasks persistently, allowing users to access their tasks even after refreshing the page or closing the browser. This ensures that user data is retained across sessions.

submodules.title: Data Retrieval
submodules.description: Handles the retrieval of tasks from localStorage upon application load, ensuring that users see their existing tasks immediately without any delay.

submodules.title: Data Synchronization
submodules.description: Ensures that any changes made to tasks (additions, completions, deletions) are immediately reflected in localStorage, maintaining data integrity and consistency.
